1.1.name: wordpress/planypus-make-a-plan
1.1.description:
For blogs that publish events, let your users tell their friends about your event and join together online to make plans to attend, at Planypus (http://planyp.us) By default, post timestamp is used as scheduled time, and "planypus_event_location" custom field as street address, and "planypus_event_location_name" as the name of venue. If you are using the Event Calendar 3 plugin (http://wpcal.firetree.net), install planypus_links_ev3.php to use the event schedulefor the date/time. Support for calendaring plugins can be easily implmented. See "Planypus_links_ev3.php" for an example.

See php files for more info.
